storyInfo: Inam and Eunectes discuss the leadership of Acahualla. A winner emerges from the swimming race.

attributes.content: Zumama, boat assembly: correct?
attributes.name: Strange Machine

attributes.content: It looks structurally sound, but there are a few things we can tweak. For exampleâ€”
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: There, that should make it more solid.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Zumama, Zumama: amazing.
attributes.name: Strange Machine

attributes.content: Just the product of experience.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: There you are, Zumama.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Inam? What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: This survey equipment has to get across, right? I came to help since I didn't have anything else to do.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Why are you thanking me? Looks like you're actually becoming one of these robots.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Yes, I'm glad to make so many new friends.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Zumama, Zumama: friend!
attributes.name: Strange Machine

attributes.content: And I've been trying to find a date for Lancet-2.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Lancet-2 is the robot that came with Rhodes Island, right?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Yes, she's my big sister now.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: I'm not skilled enough to make a robot as smart as Lancet-2, so I'm trying to find one in this group.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: And...?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: They're very nice, but not really her type.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: She likes intellectuals, like the Doctor. It's a bit of a headache.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Never mind, you're not the only weirdo in Tiacauh.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Hey everybody, this is Croque, and I've found a safer vantage point to continue the broadcast from.
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: How far until goal? 300m? Ah, forget it.
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: What's really important is that the architect Stitch Canvas, the only student of Master Finch, has found a boat and jumped into the race!
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: Oh? Looks like he's talking to us. Let's zoom in and see what he's saying...
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: 'I'm gonna win,' I think. Yup, I'm sure that's it.
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: And he just raised his middle finger to show his motivation. Looks like there's a fiery heart beneath this architect's cold surface!
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: He may have gotten a late start, but that vehicle is definitely a huge advantage.
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: He's closing the distance as we speak!
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: Things are pretty lively over there.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: I wanted to say that this is what happens with Gavial around, but she's not the only one who's let her hair down.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: You're not used to it?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: You have to get used to it, living in Acahualla.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: You get so used to it I feel weird if there's no one arguing and making noise around me.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: You're a proper Tiacauh now.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Of course I am.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Speaking of which, Zumama, if Gavial didn't come back last year, you were planning to become the Great Chief of Acahualla, weren't you?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Becoming Great Chief wasn't the real goal; it was a way for me to prove myself.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: I wanted to build the most powerful machine ever.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: I knew I shouldn't have placed any expectations on you.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Are you thinking about being lord ameer?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Good to see that you and Tomimi have learned something about politics, unlike Gavial.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: I don't know how she's survived on the outside all these years.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Some things we deal with as a matter of course just don't factor in for Gavial. Like adapting to your environment.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Haha, that's true.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: So you want her to become lord ameer? Are you sure she's suitable?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Pretty sure you could pick somebody off any street in Sargon and get a better lord ameer than her.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Agreed.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: But if we're choosing a Tiacauh to lead Acahualla, there's no one more suitable than her.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Are you speaking as a Tiacauh, or as a Sargon Messenger?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: We're entering the final stretch of the race!
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: Gavial remains in first place, but her lead continues to shrink.
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: It's not Avdotya who's closing the distance, though!
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: Despite her valiant effort, her choice of clothing has become dead weight.
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: Literally, as the weight of her clothes is slowing her down!
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: Meanwhile, Elysium is rapidly closing in!
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: Conserving his strength in the first half, Elysium now shows off his true ability.
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: He has passed Avdotya and is almost neck-and-neck with Gavial!
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: Howeverâ€”
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: Neither of them are aware of the true threat approaching!
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: I'm impressed with Elysium. I never thought he could catch up to Gavial.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: His attitude is a mask. You can't get complacent.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Yes, I noticed. He doesn't want people to know how good he is.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Don't change the subject.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Alright, looks like you've learned a thing or two at Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Not on purpose, but Master Closure makes me go to meetings about stuff besides technology, so I've heard a bunch of things.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Looks like she has high hopes for you.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: As for your question...
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: I've lived in Acahualla for a long time.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Compared to city life, I prefer to stay in the jungles, watching you people fight over stupid things.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Maybe it's hard to believe, but for me, I'm a Tiacauh a Sargon Messenger at the same time. I don't have to pick.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Or I guess I could say, my Sargon perspective tells me that Acahualla won't stay unexplored forever. That's why I hope you'll seize the opportunity.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: I believe you.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: We're headed towards a climax.
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: Exercising his explosive potential, Elysium has almost caught up to Gavial.
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: Avdotya's not out of this race yet, though, and she's still keeping pace with the two in front of her.
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: No need to push it, Avdotya!
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: But now all three of them have noticed the threat approaching from behindâ€”Stitch, riding in his boat!
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: The wonders of machinery! He has caught up to the three in front of him in a very short period of time!
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: Only a hundred meters to the goal!
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: It's like we're at the starting line again. Three swimmers and a boat, racing their way into the final stretch!
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: But, Inam.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: I won't help you convince her.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Gavial should not sit in that chair.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: You'll get the same answer if you ask Tomimi.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Figure it out for yourself. I'm busy.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: ...Fine.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: If you have too much free time, you can help me build this boat while you think about it.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: You really count every last coin, don't you?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Eighty meters!
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: Avdotya got caught in the boat's wake. She's coughing and she has to stop! Yes!
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: Er, I mean, what a shame.
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: Fifty meters!
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: Elysium tries to board the boat, but took an accidental hit from Master Edge, who is angry at Stitch, and falls back into the water!
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: There are bubbles coming to the surface. Is he okay?
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: Thirty meters!
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar
Announcement From Afar
attributes.content: Master Edge leaps from Gavial's back onto the Ale Keg, and hits Stitch on the head!

attributes.name: Announcement From Afar
attributes.content: Ouch! That must have hurt!
By the way, Ale Keg is the name that I just gave to this boat, following in the footsteps of my other masterpiece, 'The Great Aquapit'!
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: Looks like the winner will be Gaâ€”
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: Wait, not quite!
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: The fight between Master Edge and Stitch has destroyed the boat's instruments!
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: There's an ominous rumble coming from the Ale Keg!
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: She dashes ahead like an arrow!
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: Not even Gavial can catch the out-of-control boat!
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: The boat is the first to arrive at the goal!
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: The winner of this swimming contest isâ€”
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: The Ale Keg!
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: ...What?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Wait, it's not over yet!
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: The Ale Keg isn't satisfied with simply crossing the finish line!
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: She rushes ashore and charges toward the cave-in!
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: Boom!!!
Master Edge and Stitch are thrown from the boat!
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: The Ale Keg has put a huge hole in the rock blocking the tunnel exit!
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: Poor Ale Keg, never to taste the breakfast of champions!
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: A moment of silence for her!
attributes.name: Announcement From Afar

attributes.content: What on earth are these people doing?
attributes.name: Inam
